H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H314.def: = pertaining to being located behind other objects in a row

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4899.def: = a (non-eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H5273.def: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

H2158.def: = action by which one expresses utters words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4405.def: used in poetry only; = a single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing, used to form sentences with others

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6697.def: = hard stony material ◄ that forms the crust of the earth, sometimes exposed on the surface, sometimes hidding under the soil; ≈ associated with hardness, permanence, and security

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H6662.def: = state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H3374.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H216.def: = light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H2224.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H5645.def: = mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds

H5051.def: = process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light

H4306.def: = water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive

H1877.def: = a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H6779.def: = process by which plants, trees, or hairs come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities

H3468.def: = a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

H2656.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H1100.def: possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence:  = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way

H6975.def: = small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

H5074.def: = action by which humans or animals move away in haste from a certain place ► in order to escape from a situation that is considered dangerous

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H1270.def: = a strong, hard magnetic silvery-grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H2595.def: = a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp {L:iron<SDBH:בַּרְזֶל>} head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H8313.def: = process by which an object is consumed by fire

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H3429.def: = man, also known as {L:Jashobeam<SDBH:יָשָׁבְעָם>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H8083.def: = state in which a countable entity is eight in number

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H6471.def: = the lower part of the leg beyond the ankle, on which humans or animals stand and with which they walk

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H3021.def: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious activity which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

H1692.def: = state in which objects are closely compacted together

H2595.def: = a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp {L:iron<SDBH:בַּרְזֶל>} head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H1497.def: = action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3077.def: = man; ► father of {L:Benaiah<SDBH:בְּנָיָהוּ>}, warrior, later army commander of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H4928.def: literally: the ones who listen; hence: = a group of people who have been forced into  obedience by others

24.gl: to place (in a position) > to appoint

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H6214.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► warrior

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H3097.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► chief of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H445.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jair<SDBH:יָעִיר>}; from {L:Bethlehem<SDBH:בֵּית לֶחֶם>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1035.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► ancestral town of King {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H8048.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H470.def: = man; ◄ from Harod; ► warrior; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H6407.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Raphu<SDBH:רָפוּא>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H6142.def: literally: to be crooked (of a person); hence: = state in which  humans lack integrity in everything they think or do

H44.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Hammolecheth<SDBH:הַמֹּלֶכֶת>}; founder of a clan; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H4012.def: = man, also known as {L:Sibbecai<SDBH:סִבְּכַי>}; ◄ {L:from Hushah<SDBH:חֻשָׁתִי>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4121.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Netophah<SDBH:נְטֹפָה>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5200.def: = inhabitant of {L:Netophah<SDBH:נְטֹופָה>}, a town in the territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H2460.def: = fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

H1196.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Rimmon<SDBH:רִמֹּון>}; ► murderer of king {L:Ish-Bosheth<SDBH:אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת>}

H5200.def: = inhabitant of {L:Netophah<SDBH:נְטֹופָה>}, a town in the territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H863.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}; ► one of the commanders of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H7380.def: = man; ► father of {L:Ithai<SDBH:אִיתַי>}, {L:Ittai<SDBH:אִתַּי>}, warrior; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1390.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

101.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1914.def: = man, also known as {L:Hurai<SDBH:חוּרַי>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H1608.def: = mountainous region, ◄ located in the territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}

H45.def: = man, also known as {L:Abiel<SDBH:אֲבִיאֵל>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H6164.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = inhabitant of {L:Beth-Arabah<SDBH:בֵּית הָעֲרָבָה>}

H455.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Shaalbon<SDBH:שַׁעַלְבֹנִי>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3464.def: = state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with death, sometimes with being inactive

H3083.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gersom<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁום>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite assisting {L:Micah<SDBH:מִיכָיְהוּ>} and later the {L:Danites<SDBH:דָּנִי>} as {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H8048.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H2043.def: exact meaning unsure: = inhabitant of a town called Harar, or member of a clan called Hararites

H279.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Sachar<SDBH:שָׂכָר>} or {L:Sharar<SDBH:שָׁרָר>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H8325.def: = man, also known as {L:Sachar<SDBH:שָׂכָר>}; ► father of {L:Ahiam<SDBH:אֲחִיאָם>}, warrior, time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H308.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Maacah<SDBH:מַעֲכָה>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H463.def: = man, also known as {L:Ammiel<SDBH:עַמִּיאֵל>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahitophel<SDBH:אֲחִיתֹפֶל>}; ► warrior; father of {L:Bathsheba<SDBH:בַּת־שֶׁבַע>}, wife of {L:Uriah<SDBH:אוּרִיָּה>} and {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3761.def: = inhabitant of {L:Carmel<SDBH:כַּרְמֶל>}, ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H6474.def: = man, also known as {L:Naarai<SDBH:נַעֲרַי>}; ◄ {L:from Arab<SDBH:אַרְבִּי>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3008.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; tribe of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H6678.def: = Aramean kingdom, also known as {L:Aram Zobah<SDBH:אֲרַם צֹובָא>}; ◄ located north of {L:Damascus<SDBH:דַּמֶּשֶׂק>}; ► ruled by {L:Hadadezer<SDBH:הֲדַדְעֶזֶר>}; defeated and subjugated by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and then controlled by Solomon

H6768.def: = man; ◄ {L:an Ammonite<SDBH:עַמֹּונִי>}; ► one of the thirty warriors or chiefs of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5171.def: = man; ► warrior; armour-bearer of {L:Joab<SDBH:יֹואָב>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H3097.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► chief of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H223.def: = man; ◄ {L:Hittite<SDBH:חִתִּי>}; ► warrior; husband of {L:Bathsheba<SDBH:בַּת־שֶׁבַע>}; killed on the authority of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H2850.def: = member of ethnic group inhabiting {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>} before arrival of {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Heth<SDBH:חֵת>}

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number
